CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: The POBDTPD device exhibited a short - circuit current ( J sc ) of 10.6 mA cm^-2 , whereas the PEBDTPD device showed a J sc of 13.5 mA cm^-2 .

Let's think step by step.

1. POBDTPD: This is the name of the first type of device mentioned in the paragraph. It is likely a specific type of material or device, so it can be identified as a "Material Name" entity.
2. PEBDTPD: This is the name of the second type of device mentioned in the paragraph. It is also likely a specific type of material or device, so it can also be identified as a "Material Name" entity.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: The POBDTPD device exhibited a short - circuit current ( J sc ) of 10.6 mA cm^-2 , whereas the PEBDTPD device showed a J sc of 13.5 mA cm^-2 .

Let's think step by step.

1. POBDTPD: This is the name of a specific type of device.
2. PEBDTPD: This is the name of another specific type of device.
3. short-circuit current (J sc): This is a property or characteristic of the devices.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Property.

1. short-circuit current (J sc)

The short-circuit current (J sc) is a material property that refers to the electric current that flows through a device when it is short-circuited, i.e., when the anode and cathode are connected directly. In the given paragraph, the short-circuit currents for two different types of devices, POBDTPD and PEBDTPD, are mentioned.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

1. POBDTPD device: This is a type of device, but it is mentioned specifically in the context of having a certain property value, which is the short-circuit current (J sc).
2. 10.6 mA cm^-2: This is the property value for the short-circuit current of the POBDTPD device.
3. PEBDTPD device: This is another type of device mentioned in the context of having a certain property value.
